description: This file defines a React functional component 'TopNav' which renders a top navigation bar including a title, theme toggle button, and sign-out button when a user is authenticated. It manages theme state, interacts with authentication context, and handles UI interactions.

methods.name: TopNav({ title = "Home", onMenu })
methods.description: React functional component for top navigation bar with theme toggle and sign-out functionality.

methods.name: toggleTheme
methods.description: Function to toggle the theme between 'light' and 'dark'.

methods.name: onSignOut
methods.description: Asynchronous function to handle user sign-out action.
